article_title: Behind the '4 Million Obamacare Enrollees' Facade Is An Uncomfortable Truth

article_metadata.description: The White House boasts about how many have enrolled in Obamacare. But how many have paid the first premium? And more importantly, how many will continue to pay them?
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews
